content: this gorgeous just for me mossy headband earwarmer is quick to work up and uses less than one skein of yarn it has a wonderful texture and is available in 4 sizes from teen to adult large this pattern is one of the contributions to the 2025 gift for myself crochet along hosted by underground crafter > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 68-80 yds of a category 4 medium weight yarn i used lion brand made with love in the olive twist colorway * size i 5 5 mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
